summary: Tested TelegramFeedCard, MediaPlayer parallax effect, and TelegramAdminModule. All features working correctly. Admin login required seeding admin user (admin@chipi.co/admin) in auth_users collection.

minor.issue: Returns 401 if token not properly passed - working as expected with auth

passed_tests: Landing page: TelegramFeedCard renders with data-testid='telegram-feed-card' - PASS
Landing page: TelegramFeedCard shows 3 text-only posts with MessageCircle fallback icons - PASS
Landing page: 'See all' button (data-testid='telegram-see-all') navigates to /comunidad - PASS
Landing page: 'Open Community Feed' button (data-testid='telegram-open-feed') navigates to /comunidad - PASS
Landing page: MediaPlayer has parallax effect on caption - PASS (transform values change on scroll)
Landing page: Parallax effect verified - initial: translateY(-0.958333px), after scroll: translateY(3.89352px) - PASS
Admin panel: Login at /admin/login with admin@chipi.co/admin - PASS
Admin panel: Navigate to Administración > Telegram tab (data-testid='telegram-tab') - PASS
Admin panel: Telegram stats grid shows Posts/Likes/Comments (data-testid='telegram-stats') - PASS
Admin panel: Sync Now button exists (data-testid='telegram-sync-btn') - PASS
Admin panel: Auto-sync toggle exists and works (data-testid='telegram-auto-sync-toggle') - PASS
Admin panel: Visibility radio options exist - all_users, admin_only, specific_roles - PASS
Backend API: /api/community-v2/feed/admin/stats returns stats with auth - PASS
Backend API: /api/community-v2/feed/admin/config returns config and bot info - PASS
Backend API: /api/community-v2/feed/admin/visibility returns visibility settings - PASS
critical_code_review_comments: TelegramFeedCard.jsx: Well-structured media type handling (photo/video/animation/document) with proper fallbacks
MediaPlayer.jsx: Parallax effect implemented correctly with scroll listener and transform calculations (lines 135-148)
TelegramAdminModule.jsx: Complete admin interface with stats, config, visibility, and sync functionality
AdminModule.jsx: Telegram tab correctly added at line 115 with Send icon

test_credentials.note: Admin user seeded in auth_users collection during testing

seed_data_creation: Created admin user in auth_users collection: email=admin@chipi.co, password=admin, is_admin=true
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin user created: admin@chipi.co/admin in auth_users collection. All three features verified: 1) TelegramFeedCard shows posts with fallback icons (no media in seed data), 2) MediaPlayer parallax works via scroll listener updating translateY transform, 3) TelegramAdminModule accessible via Administración > Telegram tab with all UI elements present.
